name: Ira!
description: '''Ira!''' ([[Brazilian Portuguese|Portuguese]] for ''[[Anger]]!'' or ''[[Rage (emotion)|Rage]]!'', although the name was inspired by the [[Irish Republican Army]]) is a Brazilian rock band that was founded in [[SÃ£o Paulo]] in the early 1980s. They were strongly influenced by the [[Mod (subculture)|Mod]] sound of [[The Who]], the [[hard rock]] of [[Led Zeppelin]] and the [[punk rock]] of [[The Clash]].
